categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Woir Ur'naght was a Near-Human male Jedi Knight of the Jedi Order who lived during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Around the time of the Battle of Rishi, Ur'naght sold gear to fellow Jedi Knights in Raider's Cove, a port city on the remote planet Rishi. Ur'naght resembled a typical Human with fair skin, but had solid red eyes.

Woir Ur'naght appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the Level 60 Basic Gear vendor on Rishi for the Jedi Knight class His character model uses the solid red eyes that are reserved for NPCs of the Chiss species. Ur'naght and the rest of the class gear vendors at Rishi, along with all other Daily Areas and high-level planets, were replaced by a single standardized vendor in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015; Ur'naght was replaced by Master Vikto.
